params.sqlcmd: "select " +" DB0010B001_0.COUNT as DB0010B001_0_COUNT, " +" DB0010B001_1.COUNT as DB0010B001_1_COUNT, " +" DB0020B001_0.COUNT as DB0020B001_0_COUNT, " +" DB0020B001_1.COUNT as DB0020B001_1_COUNT, " +" DB0030B001_0.COUNT as DB0030B001_0_COUNT, " +" DB0030B001_1.COUNT as DB0030B001_1_COUNT, " +" DB0040B001_0.COUNT as DB0040B001_0_COUNT, " +" DB0040B001_1.COUNT as DB0040B001_1_COUNT " +"from " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0010' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 0 " +" ) DB0010B001_0, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0010' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 1 " +" ) DB0010B001_1, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0020' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 0 " +" ) DB0020B001_0, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0020' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 1 " +" ) DB0020B001_1, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0030' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 0 " +" ) DB0030B001_0, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0030' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 1 " +" ) DB0030B001_1, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0040' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 0 " +" ) DB0040B001_0, " +" ( " +" select " +" count(*) as COUNT " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +" where " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" and COST_TYP = ? " +" and CREATED_BY = ? " +" and CREATED_PRG_NM like 'DB0040' || '%' " +" and LIST_ISS_FLG = 1 " +" ) DB0040B001_1"

"select " +" T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD as PLANT_CD, " +" M_PLANT.PLANT_NAME as PLANT_NAME, " +" T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM as PROGRAM_CD, " +" SYS_OBJECTS.PROGRAM_NAME as PROGRAM_NAME, " +" T_CS_ERROR.COST_TYP as COST_TYP_DN, " +" T_CS_ERROR.CS_ERROR_CD as CS_ERROR_CD, " +" T_CS_ERROR.BATCH_TYP as BATCH_TYP_DN, " +" T_CS_ERROR.ITEM_CD as ITEM_CD, " +" T_CS_ERROR.CS_PROC_CD as CS_PROC_CD, " +" T_CS_ERROR.VEND_CD as VEND_CD, " +" T_CS_ERROR.PROC_COST_CLS_CD as PROC_COST_CLS_CD, " +" to_char(T_CS_ERROR.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as EFFECTIVE_START_DATE, " +" T_CS_ERROR.TRANSACTION_TYP as TRANSACTION_TYP_DN, " +" T_CS_ERROR.MESSAGE_CD as MESSAGE_CD, " +" SYS_BUSINESS_MESSAGE.MSG as MESSAGE, " +" T_CS_ERROR.REMARKS as REMARKS, " +" to_char(T_CS_ERROR.LIST_ISS_FLG) as LIST_ISS_FLG, " +" to_char(T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as CREATED_DATE, " +" T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_BY as CREATED_BY " +"from " +" T_CS_ERROR, " +" M_PLANT, " +" SYS_OBJECTS, " +" SYS_BUSINESS_MESSAGE " +"where " +" M_PLANT.PLANT_CD(+) = T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD " +" and SYS_OBJECTS.PROGRAM_CD(+) = T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM " +" and SYS_BUSINESS_MESSAGE.MSG_CD(+) = T_CS_ERROR.MESSAGE_CD " +" and T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.COST_TYP = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_BY = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.LIST_ISS_FLG = ? " +" and(T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%') " +"order by " +" T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD, " +" T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM, " +" T_CS_ERROR.COST_TYP, " +" T_CS_ERROR.CS_ERROR_CD"

"select " +" T_CS_ERROR.CS_ERROR_CD as CS_ERROR_CD " +"from " +" T_CS_ERROR " +"where " +" T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.COST_TYP = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_BY = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.LIST_ISS_FLG = 1 " +" and(T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%')"

"update " +" T_CS_ERROR " +"set " +" \\"LIST_ISS_FLG\\" = 1 " +"where " +" T_CS_ERROR.\\"CS_ERROR_CD\\" in ( " +" select " +" T_CS_ERROR.CS_ERROR_CD as CS_ERROR_CD " +" from " +" T_CS_ERROR, " +" M_PLANT, " +" SYS_OBJECTS, " +" SYS_BUSINESS_MESSAGE " +" where " +" M_PLANT.PLANT_CD(+) = T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD " +" and SYS_OBJECTS.PROGRAM_CD(+) = T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM " +" and SYS_BUSINESS_MESSAGE.MSG_CD(+) = T_CS_ERROR.MESSAGE_CD " +" and T_CS_ERROR.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.COST_TYP = ? " +" and T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_BY LIKE nvl(?, '%') " +" and T_CS_ERROR.LIST_ISS_FLG LIKE nvl(?, '%') " +" and(T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%' " +" or T_CS_ERROR.CREATED_PRG_NM like ? || '%') " +" )"
